thread.section_title: LilySilk Bedding Store Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of LilySilk Bedding Store | lilysilk.com
thread.title: Victor
thread.title_full: LilySilk Bedding Store reviewed by Victor

author: Victor
title: Victor
text:
There was a problem in communication, I couldn't get a track number for a long time, but the order was shipped in time and arrived shortly, they even shipped with courier delivery which is great, taking into account that shipping is free.
I love the quality, hope it will last long.
